00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 
00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00033   * @{
00034   */
00035 
00036 /** @addtogroup SYSTICK_Examples SYSTICK
00037   * @{
00038   */
00039 
00040 /** @addtogroup Period_DownCounting
00041   * @{
00042   */
00043 
00044 
00045 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 static vu32 DelayTime;
00047 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00048 void Delay(u32 nTime);
00049 void TimingDelay(void);
00050 
00051 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00053   * @brief  Main program.
00054   * @retval None
00055   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00056 int main(void)
00057 {
00058   /* Initialize LEDs */
00059   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00060   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00061   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED3);
00062 
00063   /* SYSTICK configuration */
00064   SYSTICK_ClockSourceConfig(SYSTICK_SRC_STCLK);       // Default : CK_AHB/8
00065   SYSTICK_SetReloadValue(SystemCoreClock / 8 / 1000); // (CK_AHB/8/1000) = 1ms on chip
00066   SYSTICK_IntConfig(ENABLE);                          // Enable SYSTICK Interrupt
00067 
00068   /* Infinite loop */
00069   while(1)
00070   {
00071     /* Toggle LEDs  */
00072     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED1);
00073     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED2);
00074     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED3);
00075     Delay(500); // 1ms * 500 = 500ms
00076   }
00077 }
00078 
00079 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00080   * @brief  Insert Delay time.
00081   * @param  nTime: Insert Delay time.
00082   * @retval None
00083   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00084 void Delay(u32 nTime)
00085 {
00086   /* Enable the SysTick Counter */
00087   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_CLEAR);
00088   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_ENABLE);
00089 
00090   DelayTime = nTime;
00091 
00092   while(DelayTime != 0);
00093 
00094   /* Disable SysTick Counter */
00095   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_DISABLE);
00096   /* Clear SysTick Counter */
00097   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_CLEAR);
00098 }
00099 
00100 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00101   * @brief  Decrements the TimingDelay variable.
00102   * @retval None
00103   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00104 void TimingDelay(void)
00105 {
00106   if(DelayTime != 0)
00107   {
00108     DelayTime--;
00109   }
00110 }
00111 
00112 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00113 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00114   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00115   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00116   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00117   * @retval None
00118   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00119 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00120 {
00121   /*
00122      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00123      Debug message can be added here.
00124      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00125   */
00126 
00127   while (1)
00128   {
00129   }
00130 }
00131 #endif
